__label__0 COVID-19 , Take one minute and read . Be understanding ! ! ! A Japanese doctor offer excellent advise on preventing COVID-19 . New coronavirus may not show symptom for several day ( 14-27 day ) . How can one know if the person is infected ? By the time he ha a fever and/ or a cough and go to the lung hospital , the patient may have 50 % fibrosis , and then it is too late . Taiwanese expert provide simple self-monitoring that we can do every morning : Take a deep breath and hold your breath for more than 10 second .
